proposal.fictionalClientDescription: Okanagan Artisan Interiors is a Kelowna-based interior design studio specializing in custom residential and boutique commercial spaces. They are known for their collaborative approach and a portfolio of elevated, locally inspired designs.
proposal.coverHeadline: Elevate Your Online Presence: A Digital Growth Proposal for Okanagan Artisan Interiors
proposal.coverSubheadline: Tailored Web Design & SEO Solutions for Kelowna’s Leading Interior Design Studio
proposal.clientOverview:
Okanagan Artisan Interiors has carved out a reputation in Kelowna for delivering inspired, high-end interiors that reflect both client vision and Okanagan character. With a growing portfolio of residential and boutique commercial projects, your studio has become a go-to for discerning clients seeking a collaborative, detail-driven design process. Recent word-of-mouth success and local press features have led to increased demand, and your team is now ready to invest in a digital presence that matches your brand’s elevated standards.

Your current website, while functional, doesn’t fully capture the sophistication of your work or the warmth of your approach. As you look to attract more premium residential clients and expand your reach into boutique commercial projects, you recognize the need for a digital strategy that not only showcases your portfolio but actively drives qualified inquiries. You value personal partnerships and want a digital agency that will guide you transparently through this next stage of growth.
proposal.problemAnalysis:
Despite your studio’s strong reputation and steady word-of-mouth referrals, your online presence is not working as hard as it could for you. The current website design is dated and lacks the visual impact and easy navigation that today’s design-savvy clients expect. Portfolio updates are cumbersome, and it’s challenging to highlight recent projects or client testimonials in a way that feels fresh and engaging. As a result, prospective clients often reach out with basic questions that could be answered online, or worse, may not reach out at all.

Additionally, your Google search visibility is limited, with competitors appearing above you for key terms like “Kelowna interior designer” and “custom commercial interiors Kelowna.” Your Google Business Profile is incomplete, and you’re not taking full advantage of local SEO or online reviews. This means you’re missing opportunities to be discovered by homeowners and business owners actively searching for your services.
proposal.opportunitySection:
This is an exciting opportunity to transform Okanagan Artisan Interiors’ digital presence into a true growth engine. By investing in a modern, visually stunning website and a strategic local SEO campaign, you will not only enhance your brand perception but also attract and convert more qualified leads. Our approach prioritizes both beautiful design and exceptional user experience, ensuring visitors are inspired by your portfolio and motivated to contact your team.

With our expertise in local SEO and reputation management, we’ll position you ahead of competitors for the searches that matter most. You’ll benefit from clear, jargon-free reporting and ongoing support—empowering you to focus on your craft while we drive measurable results online. Together, we’ll build a digital foundation that supports both your immediate goals and long-term vision for growth.

recommendedServices.name: Custom Web Design & Development
recommendedServices.description: A fully custom, mobile-optimized website that captures your brand’s sophistication and makes it easy for clients to explore your portfolio, learn about your process, and inquire about projects. Our design will reflect the artistry and warmth that set you apart.
deliverables: Bespoke website design and development (up to 12 pages)
Contact and inquiry forms with tracking
Web hosting and website maintenance for 12 months

recommendedServices.name: Local SEO & Google Business Profile Optimization
recommendedServices.description: Strategic optimization to ensure you’re found by local clients searching for interior design services. Includes keyword research, on-page SEO, local listings management, and a review-building strategy.
deliverables: Local keyword research and competitor analysis
On-page SEO for all core pages
Google Business Profile optimization and posting
Local citation cleanup and directory submissions

recommendedServices.name: Lead Generation & Instagram Marketing
recommendedServices.description: Targeted digital campaigns to drive qualified inquiries and grow your audience. We’ll enhance your Instagram presence with curated content and connect it seamlessly to your website for maximum impact.
deliverables: Instagram content planning (2 posts/week for 3 months)
Lead capture form and tracking integration
Google Ads setup and management (optional add-on)

implementationPhases.description: We’ll kick off with a collaborative strategy session to understand your goals, brand, and audience. We’ll conduct a digital audit and competitive analysis to inform our approach.
Our team will create website wireframes and design mockups for your review. We’ll work with you to curate portfolio content, testimonials, and key messaging.
milestones: Approval of final designs and content

implementationPhases.description: We’ll build your new website, implement on-page SEO, and optimize your Google Business Profile. Local citations and directories will be updated for consistency.
milestones: SEO and Google Business Profile optimization

implementationPhases.description: Your new website goes live! We’ll launch your Instagram content calendar and, if selected, Google Ads. We’ll provide training and ongoing support as you transition.
milestones: Kickoff of Instagram and lead gen campaigns

pricingTiers.description: Ideal for studios focused on establishing a professional online presence with core SEO essentials.
Comprehensive package for studios ready to attract and convert more local leads with ongoing digital support.
For studios seeking to dominate the local market with enhanced marketing and reporting.

caseExamples.title: Kelowna Veterinary Hospital Website & SEO Revamp
caseExamples.context: A local veterinary clinic needed a modern website and improved local search rankings to attract more pet owners.
caseExamples.result: Achieved a 62% increase in organic website traffic and doubled monthly appointment requests within four months.

caseExamples.title: Boutique Salon Local SEO Success
caseExamples.context: A Kelowna salon wanted to attract new clients and improve its Google visibility.
caseExamples.result: Moved from page 3 to page 1 on Google for key local searches, resulting in a 40% boost in new client bookings.

proposal.ctaHeadline: Ready to Transform Your Digital Presence?
proposal.ctaBody: Let’s work together to elevate Okanagan Artisan Interiors online. We’re excited to partner with you and deliver results you can see and feel. Book your discovery call to get started.

enriched.positioning: Thriveline positions itself as a boutique, Kelowna-based digital partner providing expert web design, SEO, and ongoing support for small businesses seeking reliable, results-focused online growth.
valuePropositions: Personal, responsive service from a small, dedicated team
Custom solutions tailored to each business, never cookie-cutter
Results-driven strategies focused on local visibility and business growth
Ongoing support and transparent reporting for peace of mind
differentiators: Woman-owned, locally based agency with deep community roots
Direct access to a small, skilled team—no getting passed around
Emphasis on education, transparency, and client empowerment
Custom, non-templated solutions with ongoing support
Focus on long-term partnerships rather than one-off projects
